title: tf is going on
body: me and a friend in a game, both crashed at same time and both cant reconnect, keeps saying please check internet. This happening to others and just us? in separate houses on diff internet btw, just duo queued.

replies.body: Hey, that's definitely concerning!  Is this the game you played as Kayle today, or another?  I don't see anything after that, so there is a possibility that our game server had a hiccup.  If that's the case, it would act as if it never existed.  Hop in a custom game just in case as well, just to be sure there isn't a potential ISP issue or bad node.

it is a j4 game
still going on, assuming happened to everyone. dont mind tbh, no masteries and i dont jungle >.< could you close the server though please? want to get into a new one, on that LP climb woot woot
also a reward possibly for this charming esports athlete who reported a serious problem? ;)
like aetherwing kayle possibly for a poor high school student with no job ;-; no worries if you cant of course im just an ass and tryna milk it :)

LOL, I admire the effort.  Nope, afraid not but I would like to help troubleshoot.  It sounds like your game is still going on if it's loading to a black screen, it means your connection is having problems downloading assets.  You may want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to be safe, and when you get a chance, do a custom game before queuing up again.
Yeah, thanks for the heads up as well.  I'll keep an eye out, but do let me know!

also sidenote (lots of those today) when youre chilling with the reconnect screen up it keeps trying to reconnect, seems kinda counterproductive for people tryna fix shit, pretty sure i know where its coming from (getting afkers to reconnect) but i doubt if som1 afks theyre gonna come back? Yall know more about that topic than me tho. might be something someone could look into, like maybe a check box to keep trying or not or something. is it possible to just terminate the server?

som1 else fixed it, thanks for the assistance 


god {{summoner:6}} my friend
also if it helps, the timer reset. earlier said game was going on 50+ minutes, now it says 2:00.
cant hop in custom, still has reconnect screen just is going to black then saying wont work.

it is a j4 game
still going on, assuming happened to everyone
